name: Lopode Crawler
description:
Hi everyone this is my first game on itch.io.

This game is  a Dungeon Crawler.

For the moment the game contains :

- Inifni dungeon generation.

- 3 classes ( Wizard, Warrior, Archer ).

- Over 30 different monsters.

- Over 15 items.

- Over 7 spells.

- 1 type dungeon.

This is the first version without Save/Load option and Music.

In the next update I will add:

- More Dungeon type, with more Monsters for each Dungeon.

-Sound and Save/Load option.

-More items and spells.

Thanks for testing my game and giving me some advice if you can !
